name: Copoka

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from Humble Bundle Trove.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from Humble Bundle Trove.
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Copoka/Copoka.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
